contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of November, 2016, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, without prejudice to any right Appellant may have, pursuant to Fajohn v. Com., Dep’t of Corrs., 547 Pa. 649, 692 A.2d 1067 (1997), to seek modification of his sentence nunc pro tunc in the court of common pleas.
